title: GoldTrend State Bridge 4/29: Remdesivir, Jared Kushner, Assassin's Creed: Valhalla, Warp Speed
itunes:title: GoldTrend State Bridge 4/29: Remdesivir, Jared Kushner, Assassin's Creed: Valhalla, Warp Speed
description:
On this edition of GoldTrend State Bridge Jack and Miles discuss the drug Remdesivir that has proven helpful in speeding up the healing from COVID-19, Jared Kushner said the response to COVID has been a great success, new images have been released for the next Assassin's Creed game Valhalla, and Operation: Warp Speed is the name they went with for the WH getting it together to assist in the fight against COVID.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
